definition: to refer to/to speak about/to talk about
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss
to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)

sentences.english: There are uncountable examples of how the bandage of love brings us catastrophe.
sentences.chinese: 談到愛的纏裹帶給我們的災難，更是俯拾即是。

sentences.english: They covered every single topic in the US-China relationship.
sentences.chinese: 他們談到了美中關係的每一個話題。

sentences.english: His daughter, too, spoke with pride at how much he had enjoyed work as well as family life.
sentences.chinese: 他女兒也孤高地談到他是何等地享受事情與家庭餬口。

sentences.english: Until now I have talked about the relation of dreams with the inexpressible .
sentences.chinese: 我目前已談到夢與莫可名狀的體驗的關係。

sentences.english: But size matters little when it comes to eating the crabs at the end of the safari.
sentences.chinese: 但當談到抓到以後喫螃蟹時大小並無關緊要。

sentences.english: After the game, Mussina jumbled numbers as media engulfed him.
sentences.chinese: 賽後，當媒體包圍著他老穆談到隨機變數。

sentences.english: The former Danubio youngster then reflected on his goal against Juventus.
sentences.chinese: 這位前達努比奧的年輕人談到了對尤文時攻入的進球。

sentences.english: Previously to this most recent discussion, I talked about the value of life.
sentences.chinese: 在這個最近的討論之前，我談到了生命的價值。

sentences.english: Moratti continued talking about what would have made Facchetti happy.
sentences.chinese: 莫拉蒂繼續談到了會讓法切蒂開心的事情。

sentences.english: We can talk about Lamar Odom and Hedo Turkoglu and Trevor Ariza.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以談到奧多姆，特克德魯還有阿里扎。

sentences.english: Explaining her success, Zhang said it had a lot to do with luck.
sentences.chinese: 談到她的成功，張茵說這與運氣有很大關係。

sentences.english: Once, I talked with her son. Another time with Paco.
sentences.chinese: 還有一次，我談到了她的兒子，另一次提起了佩克。

sentences.english: Several confidantes talked about Dennis's socks.
sentences.chinese: 他的一些好朋友談到了他的襪子。

sentences.english: I have mentioned at least one “perfect storm” brewing on the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 我已談到地平線上正在醞釀至少一場“雷霆風險”。

sentences.english: He says there was regular information-sharing between the mills and their suppliers that benefited both sides.
sentences.chinese: 他談到鋼鐵企業和供貨商經常信息共享，雙方獲益。

sentences.english: He talks about how we can hold up a mirror to nature.
sentences.chinese: 他談到如何塑造一面能夠反映自然的鏡子。
